EVENTS: We are pleased to offer several opportunities for you to network with participants and speakers: %[Daily Events](postback:DAILY_EVENTS) %[Evening Events](postback:EVENING_EVENTS) %[Back to Menu](postback:MENU)
DAILY:
Check out these events happening daily: %[Registration Desk](https://goo.gl/sRckXZ) %[1st Timers Orientation](https://goo.gl/Yw8inT) %[Open Jam](https://goo.gl/ATGxXR) 
More daily events: %[Coaches Clinic](https://goo.gl/26SxK4) %[Sponsor Exhibition](https://goo.gl/cfPKCd) %[Bookstore](https://goo.gl/abo9xN)
REG: Pick-up your badge and materials or ask questions at: %[Registration Desk](https://goo.gl/sRckXZ)
ORIENT: Take 30 minutes for a 101 Guide to Agile2016: %[1st Timers Orientation](https://goo.gl/Yw8inT)
JAM: Looking for nteractive sessions providing opportunities to explore ideas and techniques with fellow attendees, then check out: %[Open Jam](https://goo.gl/ATGxXR)
CLINIC: Get some one-on-one time with an experienced coach: %[Coaches Clinic](https://goo.gl/26SxK4)
BOOKS: Do a little shopping at the: %[Bookstore](https://goo.gl/abo9xN)
EVENING:
Relax and unwind at: %[Meet and Greet](https://goo.gl/DR0KbU) %[Ice Breaker Reception](https://goo.gl/CaFwgv) %[Industry Analyst Panel](https://goo.gl/Il25Xb) 
More evening events: %[Members Meeting](https://goo.gl/NYpLRz) %[Sponsor Reception](https://goo.gl/BZ8odT) %[Conference Party!](https://goo.gl/4U5rO7) 
Walking to the Conference Party?: %[Party Walking Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/jXBzXJdrb442)
MEET: Join us Sunday evening from 18:00 - 19:00 for a casual get-together with other early arrivals: %[Meet and Greet](https://goo.gl/DR0KbU)
ICE: Don't miss out on an evening filled with food, drink, live entertainment and games!: %[Ice Breaker Reception](https://goo.gl/CaFwgv)
PANEL: Our panelists will be talking about Agile Trends and Future Directions: %[Industry Analyst Panel](https://goo.gl/Il25Xb)
MEMBERS: Members are invited to meet, hear about, and discuss Alliance business with the Agile Alliance Board of Directors: %[Members Meeting](https://goo.gl/NYpLRz)
PARTY: You'll want to be at the Georgia Aquarium on Thursday night to enjoy delicious food and drinks, great music and dancing! %[Conference Party!](https://goo.gl/4U5rO7) %[Party Walking Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/jXBzXJdrb442)
DIRECTIONS: Meet fellow attendees in the Lobby of the Hyatt Regency Atlanta at 19:15 for a short guided walk to the Georgia Aquarium. Transportation will also be provided. %[Party Walking Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/jXBzXJdrb442)

A16: Yes - that's me!  What can I assist you with?

NAME: The cool people at the Agile Alliance and my creators at Sciens.io.  You can learn more about my kind and my creators at: sciens.io or sciensio.com

AGILE2017: I'm glad you asked! Agile2017 is August 7-11 in Orlando, Florida. Hope to see you there!
